text: Ojo onhoe, ki ʙa pajomʙarii tu ʙovar nadorand dar zamin sajr namekunand, to ʙingarand, ki oqiʙati peşinijonaşon cī guna ʙudaast? Tavonoii onho va jodgorihoe, ki dar rūji zamin padid ovarda ʙudand, az inho ʙeştar ʙud. Vale quvvat va ʙuzurgii tanu çismaşon ʙa onho foidae narasond. Sipas Alloh onhoro ʙa saʙaʙi gunohaşon ʙa azoʙ giriftor kard va az qahri Alloh onhoro nigahdorandae naʙud
